name: Cavernivores
description:
Project Cavernivores

Version 2020-06-21

[WALKTHROUGH: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wzytDnCb45M&feature=youtu.be]

[PERFORMANCE WARNING: browser version is possibly unstable due to performance issues. You may download offline version to play if available]

Note: for those who have difficulty beating this game: there are weapon upgrades scattered on the map between Stage 3-7 to help you finish the game

[Game jam Keyword: Revolution - Prelude to the wars between humans and cavernivores - human race were winning over the cavern race while the caverns are planning for a revolution against the humans]

[Game jam wildcard: Procedual Generation - The caverns are procedurally generated]

Programmer: Vanson (ME)

Game Designer: Vanson (ME)

Control: 

"Up / Down / Left / Right" Arrow keys to move 
OR
"W / S / A / D" keys to move 

"Space" to interact / attack 

Z = unarmed / X = melee / C = bow / V = SMG
OR
1 = unarmed / 2 = melee / 3 = bow / 4 = SMG

Supported browser: Chrome / Firefox (Other browsers do not load)

If character does not move, mouse left click on the screen and try again

Godot Wild Jam #22 - Version 20200619
